section.title: Tracers
section.para: The example Application uses a single JAIN SLEE 1.1 Tracer, named WakeUpSbb. The related log4j category is javax.slee.SbbNotification[service=ServiceID[name=Wake Up Service,vendor=NIST,version=1.0],sbb=SbbID[name=Wake Up Sbb,vendor=NIST,version=1.0]].

section.title: Alarms
section.para: The example Application does not sets JAIN SLEE Alarms.
